result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 3:26 p.m.
Clerk: Nicole.
INCLUDES: 22CFR867, 22CM670, 22CM671.

COURT notes two motions have been filed: one for Atty Roley to withdraw and motion to dismiss Atty Roley.

Case called:  9:08 a.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF867, 22CM670, 22CM671.

COURT finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.

cc: Branch 3
Preliminary Hearing on July 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Includes 22CF867, 22CM670, & 22CM671. Comply with sex offender registry requirements. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. Prints and photograph.

Clerk: Marisa; Case called: 2:09 pm 
INCLUDES 22CF867, 22CM670, & 22CM671. 
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Defendant appears by Zoom Video from MCJ with Atty Natasha Van Lieshout. 
VRCW. Reading Waived.  
Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 

PLEA: Not Guilty on misds. 

Argument re: bond. 
COURT ORDERS: $1000 cash bond to cover all 3 files - CONDITIONS: 
- Comply with sex offender registry requirements. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening
- Prints and photograph. 

BRANCH 3 CASE.
